Name: Shabti belonging to Isetemkheb
Description: Shabti of the Great Mistress of the Concubines (of the Harem) of Amun, Isetemkheb. The wig, the agricultural equipment and the inscription are in black, the latter arranged in four horizontal lines encircling the body and containing Chapter VI of the Book of the Dead. The hands are crossed over the breast, holding the agricultural equipment.
